classData.comment:
/**
     * True automatically applies the core.Observable mixin
     * @member {Boolean} observable=true
     * @static
     */
classData.name: observable

classData.comment:
/** * Valid values for the operator config:
* ['==','===','!=','!==','<','<=','>','>=','endsWith','excluded','included','isDefined','isUndefined','like','startsWith'] * @member {String[]} operators * @protected * @static */
classData.name: operators

classData.comment:
/**
         * Setting disabled to true will exclude this filter from the collection filtering logic
         * @member {Boolean} disabled_=false
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Setting disabled to true will exclude this filter from the collection filtering logic
classData.name: disabled_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Provide a custom filtering function which has a higher priority than property, operator & value
         * @member {Function|null} filterBy_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Provide a custom filtering function which has a higher priority than property, operator & value
classData.name: filterBy_

classData.description: True means not filtering out items in case the value is '', null, [] or {}
classData.name: includeEmptyValues

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set this flag to true before starting bulk updates (e.g. changing property & value)
         * to prevent multiple change events
         * @member {Boolean} isUpdating_=false
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Set this flag to true before starting bulk updates (e.g. changing property & value) to prevent multiple change events
classData.name: isUpdating_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The owner util.Collection needs to apply an onChange listener once
         * @member {Boolean} listenerApplied=false
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: The owner util.Collection needs to apply an onChange listener once
classData.name: listenerApplied

classData.comment:
/**
         * The operator to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value)
         * Valid values:
         *
         * == (not recommended)
         * ===
         * != (not recommended)
         * !==
         * <
         * >=
         * >
         * >=
         * like (collectionValue.toLowerCase().indexOf(filterValue.toLowerCase()) > -1)
         * included (expects value to be an array)
         * excluded (expects value to be an array)
         * @member {String} operator='==='
         */
classData.description:
The operator to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value) Valid values:

== (not recommended)

!= (not recommended) !== <

=

= like (collectionValue.toLowerCase().indexOf(filterValue.toLowerCase()) > -1) included (expects value to be an array) excluded (expects value to be an array)
classData.name: operator

classData.comment:
/**
         * The property to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value)
         * @member {String} property_='id'
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: The property to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value)
classData.name: property_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The scope to use for the filterBy method, in case it is provided. Defaults to this instance.
         * @member {Object|null} scope=null
         */
classData.description: The scope to use for the filterBy method, in case it is provided. Defaults to this instance.
classData.name: scope

classData.comment:
/**
         * The value to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value)
         * @member {String} value_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: The value to filter by (use the combination of property, operator & value)
classData.name: value_

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered before the operator config gets changed.
     * @param {String|null} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     * @returns {String}
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered before the operator config gets changed.
classData.name: beforeSetOperator

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if a collection item matches this filter
     * @param {Object} item The current collection item
     * @param {Array} filteredItems If the collection filterMode is not primitive contains the items which passed
     * the previous filters, otherwise all collection items
     * @param {Array} allItems all collection items
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
classData.description: Checks if a collection item matches this filter

params.description: If the collection filterMode is not primitive contains the items which passed the previous filters, otherwise all collection items
params.name: filteredItems

classData.name: isFiltered
